header.author: Resse Christophe
header.description: XML file containing definitions for some chat commands.

command.name: who
command.description: Performs a query on the server for online players matching your query.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Used to filter on the player name.

examples.example: /who -n "Candy" (will query for all online players having their name matching 'Candy').
/who -n "Cand*" (will query for all online players having their name starting with 'Candy').

parameter.name: guild
parameter.description: Used to filter on the guild name.

parameter.name: zone
parameter.description: Used to filter on the zone name.

parameter.name: race
parameter.description: Used to filter on the race name.

examples.example: /who -r Human (will query for all online players being of race 'Human').
/who -r Dwar* (will query for all online players being of race starting with 'Dwa').

parameter.name: class
parameter.description: Used to filter on the class name.

examples.example: /who -c Priest (will query for all online players being of class 'Priest').
/who -c Wa* (will query for all online players being of class starting with 'Wa').

parameter.name: server
parameter.description: Used to filter on the server name.

examples.example: /who -s Tenedron (will query for all online players of the Tenedron server).

parameter.name: level
parameter.description: Used to filter on player's level.

examples.example: /who -l 14-21 (will query for all online players between level 14 and level 21).
